original_text: The fifth angel poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast, and its kingdom was plunged into darkness. People gnawed their tongues in anguish
korean_text: 또 다섯째 천사가 그 대접을 짐승의 왕좌에 쏟으니 그 나라가 곧 어두워지며 사람들이 아파서 자기 혀를 깨물고

sentences.original_text: The fifth angel poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast,
sentences.korean_translation: 다섯째 천사가 짐승의 왕좌에 그 대접을 쏟았으며,

sentences.original_text: and its kingdom was plunged into darkness.
People gnawed their tongues in anguish
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 고통 속에서 자기 혀를 씹었습니다.
